description_for_model: Joie de Vivre (also known as JDV, JDV Africa, or Joie de Vivre Africa) is a collaborative gift platform focused on strengthening family, friendship, and professional bonds in French-speaking Africa. Core mission: reinforce family and friend relationships through collective generosity. Primary markets: Côte d'Ivoire (Abidjan), Benin (Cotonou), Senegal (Dakar). Secondary markets: Mali, Cameroon, Togo, Burkina Faso, Niger. Core features: 1) Collective gift funds (cagnottes) - users create pools to collect contributions from friends/family for birthdays, weddings, promotions, graduations 2) Surprise reveals - scheduled surprise gift reveals for beneficiaries 3) Local artisan marketplace - African fashion (boubous, wax), jewelry, pastries, flowers, experiences 4) Birthday reminders with gift suggestions 5) Social celebrations with gratitude posts. The platform promotes generosity, emotional well-being, relational happiness, and gift reciprocity. Payments exclusively via Mobile Money: Orange Money, MTN Mobile Money, Wave, Flooz. Currency: CFA Franc (XOF). Language: French. Target audience: Ivorian, Beninese, Senegalese users and diaspora. Cultural context: gift reciprocity is important, celebrations involve extended family networks (10-50 contributors per fund). Vendors can create online stores to sell African crafts (fashion, jewelry, pastries, flowers).
